code: import{useTranslation}from"@helpers/translate";import Verified from"@assets/images/icons/success.svg";import Pending from"@assets/images/icons/pending.svg";import Unverified from"@assets/images/icons/check.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const VerifyStatus=_ref=>{let{status}=_ref;const{__}=useTranslation();const statusMap={4:"unverified",3:"pending",2:"verified",1:"unverified"};const textMap={success:__("common.verified"),pending:__("common.pending"),unverified:__("common.unverified"),4:__("common.rejected"),3:__("common.pending"),2:__("common.verified"),1:__("common.unverified")};const iconMap={1:Unverified,2:Verified,3:Pending,4:Unverified};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"status ".concat(statusMap[status]||statusMap.default),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"status__icon",src:"".concat(iconMap[status]||statusMap.default)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"status__text",children:textMap[status]})]});};export default VerifyStatus;
